title: SWOT Analysis Facilitator
description: Structured session guide for facilitating a client SWOT analysis.

body.content: Help me facilitate a SWOT analysis session with my SBDC client.

body.label: Situation
body.tip: Why are you doing a SWOT now?

body.label: Details
body.placeholder: Any specific areas you want the SWOT to focus on? Known challenges or opportunities?

body.content:
Based on this context, please provide a SWOT Facilitator's Guide:

1. Suggested 60-minute session agenda with timing
2. For each SWOT category (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats):
   - 5 probing questions tailored to this business and industry
   - 2-3 industry-relevant examples to spark the client's thinking
3. A framework for prioritizing findings (what matters most)
4. How to turn the SWOT into 3-5 concrete strategic action items
5. Follow-up questions to deepen the analysis

Format as a facilitator's guide I can reference during the meeting.
